abstract: Stocks flipped between gains and losses for much of the day as traders weighed a batch of mostly positive economic reports.
snippet: Stocks flipped between gains and losses for much of the day as traders weighed a batch of mostly positive economic reports.
lead_paragraph: Signs of strength in manufacturing helped lead the Dow Jones industrial average to an eighth day of gains on Thursday, despite worries about tighter monetary policy in the United States and lingering debt woes in Europe.

headline.main: Dow Keeps Streak Alive on a Mixed Day
headline.print_headline: Dow Keeps Streak Alive On a Mixed Day
